results.title: Metformin Use and Survival in Patients with Advanced Extrahepatic Cholangiocarcinoma: A Single-Center Cohort Study in Fuyang, China
results.text_hl: ... @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ can improve the survival of advanced @<m>DISEASE_Cholangiocarcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018281 @@@EHCC@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who underwent drainage treatment, especially for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use after diagnosis of advanced @<m>DISEASE_Cholangiocarcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018281 @@@EHCC@@@ and long duration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Metformin dampens the progression of cholangiofibrosis induced by thioacetamide using deep learning.
results.text_hl: Here, we explored the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the primary prevention of cholangiofibrosis, which can precede the carcinogen-induced development of @<m>DISEASE_Cholangiocarcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018281 @@@cholangiocarcinoma@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cholangiocarcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018281 @@@CCA@@@).

results.title: Impact of metformin on the incidence of human cholangiocarcinoma in diabetic patients: a systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: We performed this meta-analysis to investigate the role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a potential protective factor for @<m>DISEASE_Cholangiocarcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018281 @@@CCA@@@.

results.title: A Phase Ib Clinical Trial of Metformin and Chloroquine in Patients with IDH1-Mutated Solid Tumors
results.text_hl: Methods: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with IDH1-mutated @DISEASE_Chondrosarcoma @DISEASE_MESH:D002813 @@@chondrosarcoma@@@, @DISEASE_Glioma @DISEASE_MESH:D005910 @@@glioma@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Cholangiocarcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018281 @@@intrahepatic cholangiocarcinoma@@@ received oral combinational treatment with the antidiabetic drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and the antimalarial drug @CHEMICAL_Chloroquine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002738 @@@chloroquine@@@.

results.title: Association of Diabetes Mellitus and Cholangiocarcinoma: Update of Evidence and the Effects of Antidiabetic Medication.
results.text_hl: In contrast, @CHEMICAL_Biguanides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001645 @@@biguanides@@@, especially @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, exert an opposite effect, associated with a reduced risk of @<m>DISEASE_Cholangiocarcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018281 @@@CCA@@@ and inhibited in vitro and in vivo @<m>DISEASE_Cholangiocarcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018281 @@@CCA@@@ progression.

citations.NLM: Saengboonmee C, Seubwai W, Lert-Itthiporn W, Sanlung T, Wongkham S. Association of Diabetes Mellitus and Cholangiocarcinoma: Update of Evidence and the Effects of Antidiabetic Medication. Can J Diabetes. 2021 Apr;45(3):282-290. PMID: 33218924

results.title: Advance of Metformin in Liver Disease.
results.text_hl: Therefore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has been found to alleviate @DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@nonalcoholic fatty liver disease@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cirrhosis@@@, relieve @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@liver damage@@@, and reduce the incidence of @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@hepatocellular carcinoma@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Cholangiocarcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018281 @@@cholangiocarcinoma@@@.
